Deer CreekStrike a balance between work and your social life at Deer Creek, a stunning community set between the snowy mountains of Mt. Rainier and the excitement of downtown Tacoma.
Situated in Puyallup, Deer Creek Apartments offers one, two and three-bedroom apartments with upgraded modern finishes and superior amenities at an appealing price.
Envision yourself enjoying the private swimming pool, working out in the fitness center, lounging in the resident clubhouse, or playing with your kids at the playground.
Deer Creek Apartments offers several amenities and is just minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment in Puyallup.
Schedule your tour today to see why so many people love calling Deer Creek Apartments in Puyallup home.
Apartment Features:
Gourmet Kitchens with Microwaves and Ice Makers
